    • Field Detail

      • id

        public int id
        The ID number of the button. This is used in GuiMenu's actionPerformed(GuiButton) to identify the button.

      • selectState

        int selectState
        The state of the button. 0 = disabled, 1 = idle, and 2/3 = selected

      • selectColor

        int selectColor

      • pos

        Vector2 pos

      • dim

        Vector2 dim

      • text

        public java.lang.String text

        Texture tex

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuiButton

        public GuiButton(int id,
         Vector2 pos,
         Vector2 dim,
         java.lang.String text)
        A basic button class. Click it, and something happens. Buttons are built into the GUI class with a hook structure.
